content: this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the pdf here the luscious one skein crochet hat has two versions as written it s slightly slouchy and very very cozy this dangerous slouch really does use every inch of the skein so only leave 6 inches or so for a tail at the beginning and weave it in carefully when you finish up the brim if you don t want to risk it go with the safe beanie option and omit rounds 9 and 10 continuing with round 11 as written this gives you a bit more room to play the original yarn is discontinued but both versions are still included looking to make a it a set check out the luscious one skein cowl 1 and luscious one skein fingerless mitts 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/luscious-one-skein-cowl 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/luscious-one-skein-fingerless-mitts
